title: Vronsky and Babin. Part two
creator_credit: Artists Films, Walter Lowendahl and S.K. Winston
brief_description: Part two of a two-part series. The internationally famous duo-pianists, Vitya Vronsky and Victor Babin, play the Polovitizian Dances, from Borodin’s opera “Prince Igor”. In this film the pianos are placed side by side so that both keyboards may be observed at the same time.
